title: VK API JSON Schema - methods
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API - methods

methods.name: friends.add
methods.description: Approves or creates a friend request.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user whose friend request will be approved or to whom a friend request will be sent.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text of the message (up to 500 characters) for the friend request, if any.

parameters.name: follow
parameters.description: '1' to pass an incoming request to followers list.

methods.name: friends.addList
methods.description: Creates a new friend list for the current user.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the friend list.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: IDs of users to be added to the friend list.

methods.name: friends.areFriends
methods.description: Checks the current user's friendship status with other specified users.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the users whose friendship status to check.

parameters.name: need_sign
parameters.description: '1' - to return 'sign' field. 'sign' is md5("{id}_{user_id}_{friends_status}_{application_secret}"), where id is current user ID. This field allows to check that data has not been modified by the client. By default: '0'.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: Return friend request read_state field

methods.name: friends.delete
methods.description: Declines a friend request or deletes a user from the current user's friend list.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user whose friend request is to be declined or who is to be deleted from the current user's friend list.

methods.name: friends.deleteAllRequests
methods.description: Marks all incoming friend requests as viewed.

methods.name: friends.deleteList
methods.description: Deletes a friend list of the current user.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: ID of the friend list to delete.

methods.name: friends.edit
methods.description: Edits the friend lists of the selected user.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user whose friend list is to be edited.

parameters.name: list_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the friend lists to which to add the user.

methods.name: friends.editList
methods.description: Edits a friend list of the current user.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the friend list.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: Friend list ID.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: IDs of users in the friend list.

parameters.name: add_user_ids
parameters.description: (Applies if 'user_ids' parameter is not set.), User IDs to add to the friend list.

parameters.name: delete_user_ids
parameters.description: (Applies if 'user_ids' parameter is not set.), User IDs to delete from the friend list.

methods.name: friends.get
methods.description: Returns a list of user IDs or detailed information about a user's friends.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID. By default, the current user ID.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order: , 'name' - by name (enabled only if the 'fields' parameter is used), 'hints' - by rating, similar to how friends are sorted in My friends section, , This parameter is available only for [vk.com/dev/standalone|desktop applications].

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: ID of the friend list returned by the [vk.com/dev/friends.getLists|friends.getLists] method to be used as the source. This parameter is taken into account only when the uid parameter is set to the current user ID. This parameter is available only for [vk.com/dev/standalone|desktop applications].

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of friends to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of friends.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Profile fields to return. Sample values: 'uid', 'first_name', 'last_name', 'nickname', 'sex', 'bdate' (birthdate), 'city', 'country', 'timezone', 'photo', 'photo_medium', 'photo_big', 'domain', 'has_mobile', 'rate', 'contacts', 'education'.

methods.name: friends.getAppUsers
methods.description: Returns a list of IDs of the current user's friends who installed the application.

methods.name: friends.getLists
methods.description: Returns a list of the user's friend lists.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID.

parameters.name: return_system
parameters.description: '1' - to return system friend lists. By default: '0'.

methods.name: friends.getMutual
methods.description: Returns a list of user IDs of the mutual friends of two users.

parameters.name: source_uid
parameters.description: ID of the user whose friends will be checked against the friends of the user specified in 'target_uid'.

parameters.name: target_uid
parameters.description: ID of the user whose friends will be checked against the friends of the user specified in 'source_uid'.

parameters.name: target_uids
parameters.description: IDs of the users whose friends will be checked against the friends of the user specified in 'source_uid'.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order: 'random' - random order

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of mutual friends to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of mutual friends.

parameters.name: need_common_count
parameters.description: Return mutual friends total count

methods.name: friends.getOnline
methods.description: Returns a list of user IDs of a user's friends who are online.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: Friend list ID. If this parameter is not set, information about all online friends is returned.

parameters.name: online_mobile
parameters.description: '1' - to return an additional 'online_mobile' field, '0' - (default),

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order: 'random' - random order

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of friends to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of friends.

methods.name: friends.getRecent
methods.description: Returns a list of user IDs of the current user's recently added friends.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of recently added friends to return.

methods.name: friends.getRequests
methods.description: Returns information about the current user's incoming and outgoing friend requests.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of friend requests.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of friend requests to return (default 100, maximum 1000).

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return response messages from users who have sent a friend request or, if 'suggested' is set to '1', to return a list of suggested friends

parameters.name: need_mutual
parameters.description: '1' - to return a list of mutual friends (up to 20), if any

parameters.name: out
parameters.description: '1' - to return outgoing requests, '0' - to return incoming requests (default)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order: '1' - by number of mutual friends, '0' - by date

parameters.name: suggested
parameters.description: '1' - to return a list of suggested friends, '0' - to return friend requests (default)

methods.name: friends.getSuggestions
methods.description: Returns a list of profiles of users whom the current user may know.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Types of potential friends to return: 'mutual' - users with many mutual friends , 'contacts' - users found with the [vk.com/dev/account.importContacts|account.importContacts] method , 'mutual_contacts' - users who imported the same contacts as the current user with the [vk.com/dev/account.importContacts|account.importContacts] method

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of suggestions to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of suggestions.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Profile fields to return. Sample values: 'nickname', 'screen_name', 'sex', 'bdate' (birthdate), 'city', 'country', 'timezone', 'photo', 'photo_medium', 'photo_big', 'has_mobile', 'rate', 'contacts', 'education', 'online', 'counters'.

parameters.name: name_case
parameters.description: Case for declension of user name and surname: , 'nom' - nominative (default) , 'gen' - genitive , 'dat' - dative , 'acc' - accusative , 'ins' - instrumental , 'abl' - prepositional

methods.name: friends.search
methods.description: Returns a list of friends matching the search criteria.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string (e.g., 'Vasya Babich').

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Profile fields to return. Sample values: 'nickname', 'screen_name', 'sex', 'bdate' (birthdate), 'city', 'country', 'timezone', 'photo', 'photo_medium', 'photo_big', 'has_mobile', 'rate', 'contacts', 'education', 'online',

parameters.name: name_case
parameters.description: Case for declension of user name and surname: 'nom' - nominative (default), 'gen' - genitive , 'dat' - dative, 'acc' - accusative , 'ins' - instrumental , 'abl' - prepositional

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of friends.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of friends to return.
